scene.name: Intro1
scene.directive: After the game, Lucina and the rest of the players made a visit to the local hotspring.
Lucina greatly enjoyed this chance to simply relax with others, but she knew that she would soon have to return to her own world.

Unsure if she would ever get to see her newly made friend again, Lucina gave you a hug before heading through the Outrealm portal that would transport her back to Ylisse for her final showdown with the Fell Dragon Grima.

scene.name: Intro 2
scene.directive: Lucina and her allies emerged victorious, changing the fate of her previously doomed world.

However, after the climatic battle, when Lucina went to confess her love to the tactician who had led their army to victory, she was devasted to hear that he had already given his heart to a different woman.
Feeling out of place in a world that no longer needed her, Lucina disappeared after whispering these words to her infant self: "Yours will be a happy future.".
Did she journey to another land or back to her own time? No one knows for certain...
... Except for you!
